reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 114/97: TOLL DEVICES - PERIOD OF VALIDATION
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 114/97: TOLL DEVICES - PERIOD OF VALIDATION
reg_info.act_under: Capital Investment Plan Act, 1993   Loi de 1993 sur le plan d’investissement

content.content: 1. For the purposes of subsection 191.2 (1) of the Highway Traffic Act, a toll device registered to a holder is validated during the period that a toll device licence agreement entered into by the holder with the Ontario Transportation Capital Corporation is in force. O. Reg. 114/97, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For the purposes of subsection 191.2 (1) of the Highway Traffic Act, a toll device registered to a holder is validated during the period that a toll device licence agreement entered into by the holder with the Ontario Transportation Capital Corporation is in force. O. Reg. 114/97, s. 1.
